SEARCH
Package map.gpx

Record Class GpxStyler

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
map.gpx.GpxStyler
Record Components:
backgroundColor - global background color of the image
graphPosition - whether the graph should be located on top or bottom of the image
strokeWidth - width of the stroke of the GPX path on the map
strokeColor - color of the stroke of the GPX path on the map
outlineColor - outline color of the stroke of the GPX path on the map
centerOffsetX - offset the center point of the GPX path on the map on the X axis
centerOffsetY - offset the center point of the GPX path on the map on the Y axis
paddingX - adds padding on top and bottom of the GPX path on the map
paddingY - adds padding on the left and right of the GPX path on the map
tileProvider - the provider of the tiles (will change the map appearance)
showStartingPoints - whether the starting point of each track on the GPX file should be shown on the map
displayElevationGraph - whether the elevation should be displayed or not
graphFillColor - color of the graph area
graphLineColor - color of the graph line
graphPlotMargin - margin around the graph plot
graphChartPadding - padding around the graph chart
public record GpxStyler(Color backgroundColor, GraphToMapPosition graphPosition, int strokeWidth, Color strokeColor, Color outlineColor, int centerOffsetX, int centerOffsetY, int paddingX, int paddingY, TileProvider tileProvider, boolean showStartingPoints, boolean displayElevationGraph, Color graphFillColor, Color graphLineColor, int graphPlotMargin, int graphChartPadding) extends Record
This class represents the available configuration when building a IGpxMapper.
